text: "Bleeding Love" is a song by Leona Lewis. It was released as her official second single on 29 October 2007 from her first album Spirit. The song is written and produced by Ryan Tedder. "Bleeding Love" is said to be like a classic Prince record, or Whitney Houston's "My Love Is Your Love". Lewis had performed the song on the live show of the fourth series of The X Factor. == Certifications == ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Leona Lewis songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs
title: Bleeding Love
